sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react' export default class signup extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { uname:'', email:'', phone:'' } } //name input text box unameHandling = (e)=> { this.setState({ uname:e.target.value}) } submitHandler =(e) => { alert(this.state.uname) } render() { //destructuring var { uname, email, phone } = this.state return (<>

User Registration

{uname}

{email}

{phone}

) } }
